name: Amerika
wikiSummary: The song deals with the worldwide dominance of the culture of the United States of America. It is sung largely in German with a chorus partly in English. It has received mixed reviews: some perceive it as anti-American, others as being opposed to globalization. The band views it as a satirical commentary on Cocacolonization. It features mentions of Coca-Cola, Wonderbra, and Mickey Mouse.
wikiText:
The song deals with the worldwide dominance of the culture of the United States of America. It is sung largely in German with a chorus partly in English. It has received mixed reviews: some perceive it as anti-American, others as being opposed to globalization. The band views it as a satirical commentary on Cocacolonization. It features mentions of Coca-Cola, Wonderbra, and Mickey Mouse.
